name: I don't know where I am
name_original: I don't know where I am
description:
People need to share and express what they feel. Some people are talented writers and transform feelings into beautiful poems. Some people make remarcable paintings.

I create games. This is my first game to convey a set of emotions I felt these days.

I hope you enjoy my little experience, and please share your thoughts on it and how you interpreted the aspects of the game.
